pkgmetadata.longdescription: Policy Learning // Framework for evaluating and learning realistic policies based on doubly robust loss functions. Policy learning methods include Q-learning, see Tsiatis et al. (2019) doi:10.1201/9780429192692, (doubly robust) V-restricted Q-learning, see Luedtke van der Laan (2016) doi:10.1515/ijb-2015-0052, and (doubly robust) sequential policy tree learning, see Zhou et al. arXiv:1810.04778.
